alert.note: Alert for Coastal Rockingham (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued January 10 at 11:53AM EST until January 10 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Ongoing moderate to major coastal flooding. Inundation depths one to three feet deep. * WHERE...Coastal Rockingham County. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * TIDAL FLOOD IMPACTS...Significant flooding continues this afternoon with residual water in the Hampton area with numerous flooded roads and residences. Water levels will slowly subside this afternoon. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Hampton Harbor NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.0 ft, Moderate 12.0 ft, Major 13.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 10/12 PM 12.3 3.0 3.4 2 Major 10/11 PM 10.1 0.6 2.2 1 None 11/11 AM 11.6 2.1 1.8 1 Minor 11/11 PM 10.6 1.1 2.3 1 None 12/11 AM 12.3 2.8 2.2 1 Moderate 13/12 AM 11.1 1.6 2.5 1 Minor &&
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
